name: Office 365 Dark Blue Theme
description: Dark blue theme based on Darkness Theme
additional_info:
Version 1.1.4
- Updated replying text color
- Updated discard button colors

Version 1.1.3
- Updated Font Editing bar

Version 1.1.2
- Updated scrollbar theme colors

Version 1.1.1
- Modified shadow drop down box to have a top border

Version 1.1
- Modified hover color
- Modified flagged email color
- Modified selected email color
- Modified Message notification color in email

Version 1.0 (BETA)
- Initial theme for mail and calendar items
- People and Tasks currently not themed properly

discussions.name: Quick quetion:  Does this style affect the body, or just the header?
